item.description: http://www.facebook.c... Thursday, August 11 at 8:00pm - August 12 at 12:00am Durty Nelly's 108 Blackstone, Boston, MA Please join us at upstairs at Durty Nelly's on Thursday, August 11 to watch the third GOP primary debate of the presidential cycle. The debate being hosted by Fox News / Iowa Republican Party / Washington Examiner and is very important as it sets the stage for the August 13 Ames Straw Poll. At the time of this posting, Bachmann, Cain, Gingrich, Huntsman, PAUL, Pawlenty, and Romeny have confirmed that they will be at the debate. The debate is scheduled to start at 9PM EST. We have the upstairs reserved from 8-12.
item.name: Boston Debate-Watching Party
